title: Was it a vintage year?
brief_description: The Rutherglen Wine Festival in northern Victoria began in 1967 as a biennial event to complement the Barossa Vintage Festival - held every other year in South Australia. This film gives an impression of the second festival at Rutherglen in 1968.
